scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && uv sync
scripts.test:backend:unit: cd backend && uv run pytest tests/test_*_unit.py -v
scripts.test:backend:integration: cd backend && uv run pytest tests/test_*_integration.py -v -m integration
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd backend && uv run ruff check --fix
scripts.typecheck:backend: cd backend && uv run mypy app/

backend/**/*.py: sh -c 'cd backend && uv run ruff check --fix'
sh -c 'cd backend && uv run mypy app/'
sh -c 'cd backend && uv run pytest tests/ -k "unit" -v'
backend/**/test_*_integration.py: sh -c 'cd backend && uv run pytest tests/ -k "integration" -v'
backend/tests/integration/**/*.py: sh -c 'cd backend && uv run pytest tests/ -k "integration" -v'
